name: Fruit Fighter v0.1
description:
Description:Food Fighter is a two-dimensional game where the player uses only the keyboard’s X key to fight against food. Different types of food will move toward the player from off-screen. The food types are Good Food, Small Bad Food, Large Bad Food, and Long Bad Food. Food will be spawned so that only one Food object will reach the player character at a time with sufficient gaps between them for the player to react.Leaderboard:
Try and get a high-score and don't forget to upload your score to the leaderboard!

Controls:
